message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hey Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $130 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 was a bit steep, but I was hoping you could meet me in the middle at $165. I'm willing to compromise to find a mutually beneficial price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a little high for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $145. That's the absolute maximum I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $145. I'm willing to compromise further and meet you at $155, which is the lowest I can go.
